sentences.english: Jane Zhang did a cover of this song during her performance at Super Girl.
sentences.chinese: 张靓颖在超级女声的比赛中表演过这首歌。

sentences.english: And today his campaign expects more super delegates will be announcing their support for Obama. Mara Liasson, NPR News, Washington.
sentences.chinese: 今天在竞选中他期待更多超级代表的选票。

sentences.english: The Maybach has been adopted as the ultimate status symbol by Russia's super-rich.
sentences.chinese: 迈巴赫被视作俄国超级富豪的”终极身份象征“。

sentences.english: This nutrient superstar is found concentrated in the brightly colored skins and flesh of most foods in their natural form.
sentences.chinese: 该超级营养素在天然果蔬的色彩缤纷的皮肉中很多。

sentences.english: <div class="cfx">The list also reflected breakneck advances in supercomputing speeds.
sentences.chinese: 这份排名还反映了在超级计算速度方面的极快进步。

sentences.english: Our packing is in Chinese national style , and suitable for display in super-market.
sentences.chinese: 我们的包装具有中国民族风格，适于在超级市场陈列。

sentences.english: Amazing Grass, Kidz Super Food, Outrageous Chocolate Flavor, 200g.
sentences.chinese: 儿童超级食物补充，无法抗拒的巧克力味，200克。

sentences.english: I just had a super-duper meal in the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我刚刚在餐厅吃了一顿超级大餐。

sentences.english: The link is the growing strain on the world"s sole superpower. America is locked into a draining and demoralising war."
sentences.chinese: 这个联系就是全球唯一超级大国面临的压力日益增加。

sentences.english: Constitutional Affairs, Ford F150 2004 Super four-wheel drive.
sentences.chinese: 政制事务局2004年福特F150超级四轮驱动。

sentences.english: Has destroyed Argentina's 5 "the super colors" the attack airplane.
sentences.chinese: 砸毁了阿根廷的5架“超级军旗”攻击机。

sentences.english: There have only ever been 106 verified supercentenarians in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 在英国也只有106位已核实的超级百岁老人。

sentences.english: That massive object acts as a gravitational lens.
sentences.chinese: 这种超级天体如同一个引力透镜。
我认为碧昂斯超级火辣。

sentences.english: Type the text that appears as a hyperlink in your document.
sentences.chinese: 键入在文档中作为超级链接显示的文本。

sentences.english: The war demonstrates the duality of the anti-terrorism campaign and the strength of superpowers.
sentences.chinese: 战争显示了超级大国反恐的两重性及力量的两重性。

definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
(neologism c. 2009) don't worry, it's all taken care of
ample/complete/hundred percent/a pure shade (of some color)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
very/completely/utterly/extremely/absolutely/hundred percent/to divide into ten equal parts
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out
